sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../user'; import { LocalStorageService } from '../local-storage.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form-page', templateUrl: './form-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form-page.component.css'] }) export class FormPageComponent { isSuccess = false; survey: User = { name: '', email: '', phone: '', feedback: '', gender: '', age: null, }; constructor(private localStorageService: LocalStorageService) { } submitForm(surveyForm: any) { if (surveyForm.valid) { console.log('Form Submitted', surveyForm.value); this.localStorageService.setItem('formData', surveyForm.value); this.isSuccess = true; } } }

Survey Form

Name is required.
Name must be at least 3 characters long.
Email is required.
Email must be a valid email address.
Age is required
Feedback is required

Thank you!

Your feedback has been submitted successfully.

We will get back to you soon.

Customer Details

Name: {{ surveyForm.value.name }}

Email: {{ surveyForm.value.email }}

Phone: {{ surveyForm.value.phone }}
